str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To bear up under, endure, suffer. From hupo and phero; to bear from underneath, i.e. to undergo hardship.
Pain, grief, sorrow, affliction. Apparently a primary word; sadness.
Unjustly, undeservedly. Adverb from adikos; unjustly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
The conscience, a persisting notion. From a prolonged form of suneido; co-perception, i.e. Moral consciousness.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
